description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. As Cerberus, explore the far reaches of the Underworld in this action packed, run 'n' gun, couch co-op, bullet-hell adventure. Areas can be approached in any order and feature multiple routes filled with disgruntled dead, tricky traps, hidden treasures, frenetic boss battles, and screen covering waves of bullets. Collect souls from the dead to level up and equip powerful attacks and abilities.
